warning.title: ⚠️ SHALLOW GAS - DO NOT SHUT IN
warning.note: Before surface casing is set, DIVERT - do not attempt to shut in the well

procedure.title: DIVERTER ACTIVATION
steps: 3. INCREASE PUMP RATE to maximum safe rate

critical.title: CRITICAL POINTS
items: ✗ NEVER close diverter with lines closed
✗ NEVER stop pumping during shallow gas
✓ Maintain maximum circulation - dilutes and displaces gas
✓ Stopping allows bridging - keeps gas in well
✓ Keep personnel away from diverter line exit

ifNotSuccessful.title: IF NOT SUCCESSFUL
items: • Continue diverting - do NOT attempt to shut in
• Consider increasing mud weight if practical
